name: Stuck in the Room
description:
Stuck in the Room

Meet our brand new game for Ludum Dare 47 .
Are you ready to find a solution of puzzle to get out of the room?  Or there are millions and millions rooms?  Infinity looped...
Are you brave enough to find out the way? Because you only you can help little girl to not be stuck in the loop.

We will be appreciated to any feedback for you game. Fill free to leave some comments and questions. Enjoy our game!

Instructions:

  • Press WASD to move character
  • Press E to interact with leavers. 
  • Read one to create checkpoint and Green one for load
  • Use Doors to move in different parts of the Room

Find the way to put right boxes on right platforms and you will se what will happen :)

You can contact us if you want:

  • https://ldjam.com/users/neqit
  • https://ldjam.com/users/ianmust
